name: Acerinox, S.A.
goal: Participar en el proceso de toma de decisiones de la UE, para que los responsables de las decisiones de la UE conozcan nuestras opiniones e intereses.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: La política industrial, comercial y de medio ambiente en la UE.
